bike.description: 600 Series OCLV Carbon, made in the USA, KVF (Kammtail Virtual Foil) tube shape, DuoTrap compatible, SC Speed Box compatible, includes SC Draft Box

Bontrager Race Lite, Tubeless Ready (XS: Xero XR-210 650c)
